Outcome.DescriptionText: After Scouting the area, your troops find an entrance to a hidden cave and enter it. What they find is truly astonishing; It seems that the pirates have massed a great number of artifacts, which will sell nicely on the free market. Also, of the artifacts is a marvel which will help our empire. Unfortunatley, it seems that a small remnant fleet was drawned to this place as well. The ships are attacking immediately!
